AT.name: PictoParty
AT.description: Gather around for a fun evening with PictoParty! Challenge your friends or family in a game of draw and guess. Take turns and draw the words you see on the GamePad touch screen – the image is simultaneously being plotted live on the TV-screen – for everyone to guess. Choose from existing dictionaries, packed with more than 700 words, or get creative and make your own lists. The possibilities are never-ending! - Up to 15 players at once – but only one Wii U™ GamePad needed. - Get creative and add new words. - All-against-all or team game. - Family-fun for all ages.

AU.name: PictoParty
AU.description: Gather around for a fun evening with PictoParty! Challenge your friends or family in a game of draw and guess. Take turns and draw the words you see on the GamePad touch screen – the image is simultaneously being plotted live on the TV-screen – for everyone to guess. Choose from existing dictionaries, packed with more than 700 words, or get creative and make your own lists. The possibilities are never-ending! - Up to 15 players at once – but only one Wii U™ GamePad needed. - Get creative and add new words. - All-against-all or team game. - Family-fun for all ages.

BG.description: Gather around for a fun evening with PictoParty! Challenge your friends or family in a game of draw and guess. Choose from existing dictionaries, packed with more than 700 words, or get creative and make your own lists. The possibilities are never-ending! - Up to 15 players at once – but only one Wii U™ GamePad needed. - Get creative and add new words. - All-against-all or team game. - Family-fun for all ages.

BE.name: PictoParty
BE.description: Réunis-toi pour une soirée amusante autour de PictoParty ! Mets tes amis ou ta famille au défi de dessiner et de deviner. Chacun son tour, dessine les mots inscrits sur l'écran tactile de manette – l'image est transmise simultanément sur l'écran de la télévision – afin que tout le monde puisse deviner. Choisis parmi les dictionnaires existants, débordants avec plus de 700 mots; ou créé tes propres listes. Les possibilités sont sans fin ! - Jusqu'à 15 joueurs à la fois, une seule Wii U™ GamePad suffit. - Sois créatif et ajoute d'autres mots. - Chacun pour soi ou en équipe. - Du plaisir en famille pour tous les âges.

ES.name: PictoParty
ES.description: ¡Reúnanse y pasen una divertida velada con PictoParty! Desafíen a sus amigos o a su familia con este juego de echarlo a suertes y adivinar. Túrnense y saquen las palabras que aparecen en la pantalla táctil de la consola de juegos - la imagen se diseña simultáneamente en directo en la pantalla del televisor - para que cualquiera pueda adivinarlas. Hagan su selección en los diccionarios existentes, con más de 700 palabras, o sean creativos y creen sus propias listas de palabras. ¡Las posibilidades son infinitas! - Hasta un máximo de 15 participantes a la vez, pero con una sola consola de juegos. - Sean creativos y añadan nuevas palabras. - "Todos contra todos" o jueguen en equipo.' - Un divertimento familiar para todas las edades.

PT.name: PictoParty
PT.description: Reúna-se com família e amigos para uma noite divertida com PictoParty! Desafie seus amigos ou família para um jogo de tirar a sorte e adivinhar. Pegue sua vez e tire a sorte as palavras que vê na tela tátil de sua console de jogos – a imagem é simultaneamente desenhada na TV – para todo o mundo adivinhar. Escolha a partir dos dicionários existentes com mais de 700 palavras, ou seja criativo e crie suas próprias listas. As possibilidades não têm fim! - Até 15 jogadores simultaneamente – mas somente é necessário um console de jogos Wii U™. - Seja criativo e adicione novas palavras. - Todos contra todos ou jogo de equipe. - Divertimento familiar para todas as idades.
